targets.expr:
(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

(avg(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod))

node_filesystem_size_bytes {fstype=~"ext4|xfs|zfs",mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}

100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))",fstype=~"ext4|xfs|zfs"} * 100) / node_filesystem_size_bytes {mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))",fstype=~"ext4|xfs|zfs"})
100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"} * 100) / node_filesystem_size_bytes {mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"})
node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}
node_filesystem_files_free{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}
targets.legendFormat: Pvc: $pvcName, Mount Point: {{mountpoint}} - Free file nodes

targets.expr: node_filesystem_files{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}
targets.legendFormat: Pvc: $pvcName, Mount Point: {{mountpoint}} - File nodes total

targets.expr: node_filesystem_readonly{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}

panels.description: Whether an error occurred while getting statistics for the given device

targets.expr: node_filesystem_device_error{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"}

panels.title: Filesystem Device Error

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted

targets.expr: 100 - ((node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"} * 100) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint=~"(^/var/lib/.+/($pvName/mount))"})

panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic

targets.expr: rate((node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{device=~"$device"}  [$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The number of bytes read from or written to the device per second

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Disk R/W Data

panels.description: The number of read and write requests merged per second that were queued to the device

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_reads_merged_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(node_disk_writes_merged_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Disk R/W Merged

panels.description: Total number of reads completed successfully

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Disk IO Reads

panels.description: Total no. of writes completed successfully

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Disk IO Writes

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.description: Total no. of discards completed successfully and total no. of discards merged

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_discards_completed_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(node_disk_discards_merged_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Disk IOps Discards completed / merged

panels.description: The average queue length of the requests that were issued to the device

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Average Queue Size

panels.description: The number of outstanding requests at the instant the sample was taken. Incremented as requests are given to appropriate struct request_queue and decremented as they finish.

targets.expr: rate(node_disk_io_now{device="$device"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Instantaneous Queue Size
